doc:
Fritz Leiber (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fritz_Leiber_(actor) 0 Fritz Reuter Leiber Sr. (January 31, 1882 – October 14, 1949), was an American actor. A Shakespearean actor on stage, he also had a successful career in film. He was the father of science fiction and fantasy writer Fritz Leiber, Jr., who was also an actor for a time. Fritz_Reuter_Leiber_Sr. ( January_31_,_1882 – October_14_,_1949 ) , was an_American_actor . A_Shakespearean_actor on stage , he also had a_successful_career in film . He was the_father of science_fiction_and_fantasy_writer_Fritz_Leiber , Jr. , who was also an_actor for a_time .
